wisheshayen samruddhi niladharin rajya sewaye purna wishrama watup himi thanathuraka pihituwima menma diwi nanguma departhamenthuwa pihituwa rajya sewaye niladharin labana ayithiwasikam ha pahasukam labadimata wiwidha badhaka ha abhiyoga hamuwe nolasi kapawimen katayuthu karanu labuwe sandhana rajayayi.esema krushikarma paryeshana niladharinge ha samruddhi niladharinge boho gataluwalata wisandum labademin apa niladharin mangin janathawage dilindukam pitudakimata menma gowi janathawa nagasituwimata niwaradiwa meheyawanu labuweth, poduwe samastha rajya sewaye ayithiwasikam labadimata katayuthu karanu labuweth, mema rajayayi.ee anuwa idiri dina kihipaya thula apa sangamayata sambandha samruddhi ha krushi niladharinge sahabhagithwaya athiwa uuwa palath sabha mathiwaranaye jayagrahanaya wenuwane wishala sahayogayak labadimata apa sangamaye widhayaka sabhawe eekamathika anumathiya labuni.

ape asata athulu wana aalokaya akshi kachaya magin ase athulathinma thibena drushti withanaya mathata nabhigatha karanawa.drushti withanayen thamayi aaloka kirana alla ganne.nathnam,prathigrahanaya karanne.ee wagema drushti withanaye thibena wisheshitha saila warga (kethu saila saha yashti saila ) magin aalokaya sanwedanaya karanu labanawa.ee widiyata athiwana sanwedana, snayu paniwida bawata path karanna thawath snayu saila stharayak (dwidhrawa niyurona saha gangliya saila)drushti withanaye thibenawa.ee snayu saila wala aksanaya kiyala handunwana kotas ekathu wela thamayi apata penima athi karanna athyawashya wana drushtka snayuwa hadanne.drushtika snayuwa akshi golaye pitupasin aarambha wela ape molaye,penimata wadagath wana pradeshayata sanwedana ragena gihin eewa handunagaththama thamayi apata hama deyakma penime hakiyawa labenne.
